title: San Serif Distressed/Grunge Font
content:
Anybody know what this font is?? The closest font I was able to find was "Birth of a Hero." Appreciate the help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161302im_/http:/typophile.com/files/success_3488.jpg)

Font: 

 Aristotle Punk 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161302/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [success.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161302/http:/typophile.com/files/success.jpg) | 132.99 KB |
author: kvnrangel

comments.content:
There is a very strong possibility that this is just a custom-distressed setting of Avant Garde:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161302/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic/")

This is **Aristotle Punk** by Andrew Hart [2009-2013, free for personal use]  
Kevin is right, it's a modified Avant Garde and it actually says so and credits Herb Lubalin in the copyright.

Your sample is probably created using an older version [2009] and the text set is "sUccess is a cHOice": **[Aristotle Punk (2009)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161302/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Aristotle%20Punk%20-%20Regular&fid=35b61ca8f8a1fcd8e4315c36eb05c527&fsize=60&text=sUccess%20is%20a%20cHOice&wrap=2)**  
The current version, which you can download from Dafont.com, is a bit different and you may need to flip the /C to match your sample: **[Aristotle Punk (2013)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161302/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Aristotle%20Punk%20-%20Regular&fid=482e3623172e6f35d95356ada3027405&fsize=60&text=sUCCess%20is%20a%20CHoICe&wrap=2)**
Thank you guys for your responses. Aristotle Punk is right on. Thanks!!
